Comment: >Immediately, the explosion degraded the Islamic Republicâ€™s military.  Here comes the TV journalism complex and its followers to tell us how this is the scandal of the century.
Author: D_Ethan_Bones

Comment: As the United States and the Iranian regime meet for the third round of talks in Oman, an explosion rocked Shahid Rajaee Port near Bandar Abbas, Iran, on April 26, 2025. The blast injured more than 500 people and killed at least four, according to regime reports. Considering the level of destruction, these numbers likely will rise. No matter its cause, this explosion will damage the regime itself and could shorten its longevity.
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293

Comment: No one despises that regime more than I do, but I'm sick and tired of over 40 years of constant predictions that it is on the precipice of collapse. Demonstrations alone never topple an oppressive regime that uses force to maintain power. The only two things that might remove the mullahs are 1) armed struggle or 2) a prolonged general strike.  As of today, neither are in the offing.
Author: Vessarionovich

Comment: Or that Trump somehow orchestrated it.
Author: ComputerRedneck
